activities: Socialcast processes or contemplates processing EEA and Swiss personal data relating to: 1) representatives and employees of actual and prospective corporate customers and business partners in order to manage business relationships, and provide information and contracted products and services; 2) representatives and employees of actual and prospective vendors and suppliers in order to manage business relationships and receive contracted goods and services; 3) individuals whose data Socialcast processes on behalf of business customers as a service provider or mere data processor; 4) product end users and prospective end users in order to provide information on services and products; 5) individuals who visit the Socialcast website or a website run by its business partners or service providers, or use a mobile applications developed, sold or provided by Socialcast; 6) technical and configuration data (to the extent that it is consider personal data) from customer and end user computers, servers, devices and peripherals; 7) personal data that a customer, partner or their end users may place in the product or service; 8) customer and end user behavioral data associated with the use of products or services; and 9) personal data received as part of providing support services.  Socialcast maintains a privacy policy for information it collects in connection with its online business activities. Socialcast does provide individuals with a reasonable mechanism to exercise their choices. In other areas, such as the provision of services, Socialcast acts as a data processor and holds and processes data at the direction of its customer (which acts as a data controller and is responsible for providing any notices and obtaining any required consents from the data subjects).
corpofftitle1: Senior VP & General Counsel of VMware
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, online, manually processed information from, about or relating to our customers, customers' end users, prospective customers, suppliers, vendors, and partners
privacyprograms: Socialcast will cooperate with the EEA and Swiss data protection authorities as its enforcement mechanism.
recoursemech:
EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC). 

If you have questions or concerns regarding this statement, you should first contact us at privacy@socialcast.com. If you do not receive acknowledgement of your inquiry or your inquiry has not been satisfactorily addressed, you should contact TRUSTe at: https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request TRUSTe will then serve as a liaison with us to resolve your concerns. You can contact us by writing or emailing us at the address below: Socialcast 501 Second St., Suite 700 San Francisco, CA 94107 Email: privacy@socialcast.com
